description: Lists all the accounts in the organization.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Using the ListAccounts API call, an attacker can enumerate all accounts within the AWS organization, gaining insight into the structure and scope of the organization's AWS environment.

incidents.description: When a Zero Day and Access Keys Collide in the Cloud: Responding to the SugarCRM Zero-Day Vulnerability

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListAccounts to gather information about the structure and resources of an organization's AWS environment.
